name: BuildWheel
description: Creates wheels using all installed copies of Python.
author: Steve Dower

inputs.name: outputdir
inputs.label: Output Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where wheels will be written. By default, `$(Build.BinariesDirectory)\dist` is used.

inputs.name: universal
inputs.label: Create a Universal wheel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Marks the wheel as universal. Only the last found copy of Python will be used to build the wheel.

inputs.name: signcmd
inputs.label: Signing command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional command to execute between `build` and `bdist_wheel`.

inputs.name: python
inputs.label: Python
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search path for installed Python versions. This will be passed to Get-ChildItem and all matches will be used to build, unless building a universal wheel.

inputs.name: dependencies
inputs.label: Dependencies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Packages to install prior to building wheels.

inputs.name: workingdir
inputs.label: Working Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where wheels will be written. By default, `$(Build.BinariesDirectory)` is used.
